p: For mild symptoms the advice is different in different geographical regions, some advise the COVID-19-positive individuals with mild symptoms to quarantine at home, practice self-isolation, keep a check on their symptoms along with symptomatic measures like antipyretic. Whereas in some regions where the healthcare system is not overwhelmed, they are being held in quarantine under supervision until they test negative to avoid itâ€™s spread [ 9]. For moderate to severe symptoms, however, the patients are shifted to the hospital and are managed there. Some of the patients do progress to severe form of the disease or ARDS and multi-organ failure and then need ICU care and other supportive measures.
